# BetterController

> A Ruby gem for building modern Rails controllers with a declarative DSL, Hotwire/Turbo support, and ViewComponent integration.

BetterController provides a clean, declarative way to build Rails controllers with:
- Action DSL for defining controller actions
- Built-in Hotwire/Turbo Frame and Stream support
- ViewComponent integration for page rendering
- Service layer pattern support
- API response helpers
- Parameter validation
- Pagination utilities
- Structured logging

## Quick Start

```ruby
# HTML Controller with Turbo/ViewComponent
class UsersController < ApplicationController
  include BetterController

  action :index do
    service Users::IndexService
  end

  action :create do
    service Users::CreateService

    on_success do
      html { redirect_to users_path }
      turbo_stream { prepend :users_list }
    end

    on_error :validation do
      html { render_page status: :unprocessable_entity }
    end
  end
end

# API Controller
class Api::UsersController < ApplicationController
  include BetterControllerApi

  def index
    respond_with_success(User.all)
  end
end
```
